name: Voiceless Mnemosyne
description: Voiceless Mnemosyne is a dungeon crawler created in Unity in which you attempt to uncover the mysteries of a labyrinth and the secrets of those who traced its corridors long ago. The labyrinth is a dark and foreboding place that has remained uncharted. You will have to do without a map, so move carefully, lest you be lost, aimlessly wandering the corridors like so many before you. The game is expected to last between 20 – 30 minutes.
